2. right click on 'res'  -> 'Reformat Code'
update readme concerning foss releases

update material dialogs core to 0.8.5.1

I had an error described here:
https://github.com/afollestad/material-dialogs/issues/819, when I set up
my new development environment caused by missing dependencies. Updating
the package fixes the problem.

remove assigned but unused variable

Android Studio warning.

make variables local

Android Studio warning.

be consistent regarding the nav drawer

At start of our app the gastronomy locations are displayed. Pulling out
the navigation drawer from the left has no selection. Clicking on
'gastronomy' the item is selected in the drawer and the view does not
change, because it is already displayed.

Setting the default selected item to 'gastronomy' at start up makes the
app behaviour more consistent.

rename for consistency

Other menu layout follow this naming convention.
